participant_1.background:
I've had to make a lot of sacrifices for my family, but it's all been worth it.
i eat mainly chinese food.
I love spending time with my family because they are always there for me.
i do not have a college degree.
I keep a healthy weight for my age.

participant_2.background:
I stayed in and ordered a pizza, even though I had promised myself I would eat healthier.
i am almost 7 feet tall.
I can't do a lot of things that other people can do because I'm in a wheelchair, but I try to stay positive and make the best of my situation.
I'm passionate about writing because it allows me to express my thoughts and feelings in a way that I can't otherwise.
i wish i had money to travel.

content.text: Hey, I'm really into Chinese food, it's my favorite! What's your favorite food?
I actually stayed in and ordered a pizza, even though I had promised myself I would eat healthier. What about you?
That sounds good, I'm not opposed to pizza. I usually try to keep a healthy weight for my age, though.
I'm not that tall, only 5'9", but I do have to eat a lot because of my height.
That's a good point. I'm not sure how I would manage to be so tall!
I have some health problems that come with being so tall, but I try to stay positive and make the best of my situation.
That's great that you stay positive. I can't imagine what it would be like to be so tall, but it sounds like you're handling it well.
So what are you passionate about?
I'm really passionate about writing. It's a way for me to express my thoughts and feelings in a way that I can't otherwise.
That's great! I've always wanted to be a writer, but I'm not very good at it.
You should give it a try! It's really fun to be able to put your thoughts and feelings into words.
I might have to give it a try someday
